---

## What Documentation is Needed?
A clear and concise description of what documentation is missing or needs improvement.

## Location
Where should this documentation be added or updated?
- [ ] README.md
- [ ] CONTRIBUTING.md
- [ ] API_DOCUMENTATION.md
- [ ] Code comments/JSDoc
- [ ] Other (please specify): ______

## Current State
How is this currently documented (if at all)? What's missing or confusing?

## Proposed Documentation
What should the documentation include? Provide examples or an outline if possible.

## Audience
Who is the intended audience for this documentation?
- [ ] Backend developers
- [ ] Frontend developers
- [ ] DevOps/Infrastructure team
- [ ] All contributors
- [ ] End users

## Additional Context
Add any links to related code, issues, or external resources that would help with writing the documentation.

---

**Before requesting documentation:**
- [ ] Check existing documentation in [CONTRIBUTING.md](../../CONTRIBUTING.md) and [API_DOCUMENTATION.md](../../API_DOCUMENTATION.md)
- [ ] Consider if this could be a comment in the code instead
- [ ] Provide specific examples of what's unclear or missing
